00019         {
00020                 virtual const char* what() const throw()
00021                 {
00022                         return "There is no such event";

00026         class P300KeyDescriptor
00027         {
00028         public:
00029                 P300KeyDescriptor()
00030                 {
00031                         actions = new std::vector<OpenViBE::CString>();
00032                         eventMapScaleSize = new std::map<VisualState, OpenViBE::float32>();
00033                         eventMapForegroundColor = new std::map<VisualState, GColor>();
00034                         eventMapBackgroundColor = new std::map<VisualState, GColor>();
00035                         eventMapSource = new std::map<VisualState, OpenViBE::CString>();
00036                         eventMapLabel = new std::map<VisualState, std::string>();
00037                         eventMapIsTextSymbol = new std::map<VisualState, OpenViBE::boolean>();
00038                 }
00039                 
00040                 ~P300KeyDescriptor()
00041                 {
00042                         eventMapScaleSize->clear();
00043                         eventMapForegroundColor->clear();
00044                         eventMapBackgroundColor->clear();
00045                         eventMapSource->clear();
00046                         eventMapLabel->clear();
00047                         actions->clear();
00048                         eventMapIsTextSymbol->clear();
00049                         delete eventMapScaleSize;
00050                         delete eventMapForegroundColor;
00051                         delete eventMapBackgroundColor;
00052                         delete eventMapSource;
00053                         delete eventMapLabel;   
00054                         delete actions;
00055                         delete eventMapIsTextSymbol;
00056                 }
00057                 
00058                 void toString()
00059                 {
00060                         std::map<VisualState, OpenViBE::float32>::iterator iteratorScaleSize = eventMapScaleSize->begin();
00061                         //std::vector<OpenViBE::CString>* actions;
00062                         std::map<VisualState, GColor>::iterator iteratorForeground = eventMapForegroundColor->begin();
00063                         std::map<VisualState, GColor>::iterator iteratorBackground = eventMapBackgroundColor->begin();
00064                         std::map<VisualState, OpenViBE::CString>::iterator iteratorSource = eventMapSource->begin();
00065                         std::map<VisualState, std::string>::iterator iteratorLabel = eventMapLabel->begin();
00066                         std::map<VisualState, OpenViBE::boolean>::iterator iteratorIsText = eventMapIsTextSymbol->begin();
00067                         
00068                         std::cout << "Key descriptor\n";
00069                         for (;iteratorIsText!=eventMapIsTextSymbol->end(); iteratorIsText++)
00070                                 std::cout << "Is text label in state " << iteratorIsText->first << "? " << iteratorIsText->second << "\n";                      
00071                         for (;iteratorLabel!=eventMapLabel->end(); iteratorLabel++)
00072                                 std::cout << "Label in state " << iteratorLabel->first << " is " << iteratorLabel->second.c_str() << "\n";
00073                         for (;iteratorSource!=eventMapSource->end(); iteratorSource++)
00074                                 std::cout << "Source file in state " << iteratorSource->first << " is " << iteratorSource->second.toASCIIString() << "\n";                      
00075                         for (;iteratorScaleSize!=eventMapScaleSize->end(); iteratorScaleSize++)
00076                                 std::cout << "Scale size in state " << iteratorScaleSize->first << " is " << iteratorScaleSize->second << "\n";
00077                         for (;iteratorBackground!=eventMapBackgroundColor->end(); iteratorBackground++)
00078                                 std::cout << "Background color in state " << iteratorBackground->first << " is " << iteratorBackground->second.red <<
00079                                 ", " << iteratorBackground->second.green << ", " << iteratorBackground->second.blue << "\n";                    
00080                         for (;iteratorForeground!=eventMapForegroundColor->end(); iteratorForeground++)
00081                                 std::cout << "Foreground color in state " << iteratorForeground->first << " is " << iteratorForeground->second.red <<
00082                                 ", " << iteratorForeground->second.green << ", " << iteratorForeground->second.blue << "\n";
00083                         std::cout << "----------------\n";
00084                 }
00085                 
00086                 //modifiers
00087                 void addScaleSize(const VisualState event, const OpenViBE::float32& value);
00088                 void addForegroundColor(const VisualState event, const GColor& value);
00089                 void addBackgroundColor(const VisualState event, const GColor& value);
00090                 void addSource(const VisualState event, const OpenViBE::CString& value);
00091                 void addLabel(const VisualState event, const std::string& value);
00092                 void setIfTextSymbol(const VisualState event, const OpenViBE::boolean value);   
00093                 
00094                 void addAction(const OpenViBE::CString& action) { actions->push_back(action); }
00095                 void setDimensions(BoxDimensions& dim) { dimensions = dim; }
00096                 
00097                 //getters
00098                 const OpenViBE::float32 getScaleSize(const VisualState event) const;
00099                 const GColor& getForegroundColor(const VisualState event) const;
00100                 const GColor& getBackgroundColor(const VisualState event) const;
00101                 const OpenViBE::CString& getSource(const VisualState event) const;
00102                 const std::string& getLabel(const VisualState event) const;
00103                 const OpenViBE::boolean isTextSymbol(const VisualState event) const;
00104                 const OpenViBE::boolean isActionEnabled(OpenViBE::CString action);
00105                 const std::vector<OpenViBE::CString>* getActions() const { return actions; }
00106                 const OpenViBE::CString getAction() const { return actions->at(0); }
00107                 const BoxDimensions& getBoxDimensions() const { return dimensions; }
00108                 
00109         
00110         private:
00111                 BoxDimensions dimensions;
00112                 std::vector<OpenViBE::CString>* actions;
